svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 24 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 24, 2024" date: "2024-02-24"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
â€¢ Mainnet shadow fork successfully upgraded to Dencun, tested blobs with each EL/CL pair and MEV
relayers
Mainnet shadow fork successfully upgraded to Dencun, tested blobs with each EL/CL pair and MEV
â€¢ Client releases for mainnet Dencun upgrade , update your nodes Consensus layer: Lighthouse v5.0.0
Lodestar v1.16.0 Nimbus v24.2.1 Prysm v5.0.0 Teku v24.2.0 Execution layer: Besu v24.1.2 Erigon v2.58.1
Otterscan v2.4.0 alpha : adds blob info Geth v1.13.13 Nethermind v1.25.4 Reth v0.1.0-alpha.19

Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Electra upgrade
scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra
Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for Electra ePBS and
increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction)
and case for targeting staking ratio of 1/4 Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol &
SSZification for Electra
â€¢ Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in
parallel to Electra Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for
Electra ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra Proposed issuance curve adjustment
(30% reduction) and case for targeting staking ratio of 1/4 Light client roadmap : proposes backfill
protocol & SSZification for Electra
â€¢ peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra
peerDAS (EIP7594) : develop in parallel to Electra
â€¢ Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for Electra
Inclusion lists (EIP7547) : speed run proof of concept to check complexity for Electra
â€¢ ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra
ePBS and increase max EB (EIP7251) : unlikely for Electra
â€¢ Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for targeting staking ratio of 1/4
Proposed issuance curve adjustment (30% reduction) and case for targeting staking ratio of 1/4
â€¢ Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol & SSZification for Electra
Light client roadmap : proposes backfill protocol & SSZification for Electra
Osaka upgrade (meta EIP7607 )

Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.54% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.54% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Geth 68% supermajority, could cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 38%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe

Layer 2
â€¢ OP chains Delta upgrade live, adds span batches which reduces fixed costs by over 90%
OP chains Delta upgrade live, adds span batches which reduces fixed costs by over 90%
â€¢ ZK grants round to improve ZK Layer 2 ecosystem, $900k in funds from EF, Aztec, Polygon, Scroll,
Taiko & zkSync, applications close March 18

& zkSync, applications close March 18
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7625 : Contract IDs and metadata extension ERC7627 : Secure messaging
protocol ERC7628 : ERC721 balance extension ERC7629 : Unified token ERC7631 : Dual nature token pair
(DN404 hybrid ERC721 & ERC20) ERC7632 : Interfaces for named token ERC7634 : Limited Transferrable NFT
(ERC721 extension) ERC7635 : Multi-Fungible Token

â€¢ Fuzz-utils : generate Foundry unit tests from Echidna & Medusa failed properties

King of the Frame strategy , gas optimizations to lower cost of stealing

Circom-plus (language server): supports go to definition & Circom 2

Security

â€¢ Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group started, open to everyone

MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 11.8 to 198.7 gwei, with 34 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.5 gwei 8.6k ETH net burn this week

OP mainnet & Base

folding schemes

End of service: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News

https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-february-24-2024
